DOC.brief_summary: Assesing the impact of mentoring on the lifestyle choices of adolescents who are overweight
DOC.brief_title: Mentors in Motion: A Physical Activity Intervention for Obese Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized controlled trial of the impact of weekly contacts with mentors to improve physical activity pattern, self esteem, and weight loss in obese teenagers over a 6 month period.
DOC.criteria: 1317 yo Able to participate in physical activity On medications that could affect weight
